title: 280: The Power of One More with Ed Mylett
itunes:title: 280: The Power of One More with Ed Mylett
description:
What if you were one action away from achieving your goals and changing your life?

You already know that mindset is the beginning of everything. But limiting beliefs can be tricky to identify, and they often work to subconsciously hold you back by making you feel overwhelmed and unprepared as you make progress. And sometimes all you need to do to overcome these obstacles is one more thing.

To talk about this powerful mindset, I’m thrilled to have Ed Mylett on our show today. Ed is an entrepreneur, keynote speaker, philanthropist, podcast host, and best-selling author of #Max Out Your Life: Strategies for Becoming an Elite Performer. In his newest book, The Power of One More: The Ultimate Guide to Happiness and Success, he teaches you how to turn emotion into action through the power of one more.

You’re much closer to your dreams than you realize, but you have to change your mindset towards success first. You never know when you’re one relationship, one meeting, one decision away from achieving greatness. Listen in, as Ed walks you through how to overcome the beliefs holding you back by going one extra step.

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
